topics.body:
I remembered I had a second dream.
It wasn't really a weird dream to begin with but it was the most realistic one.

I climbed treetops.
That's it.

I climbed treetops, going from tree to tree and walking on the thick branches. I nearly fell at one point but I managed to climb back up. Woke up when I reached the ground.

This was surprisingly a great dream.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
What would happen if we had an actual Grand Galloping Gala in the real world?

Like, a real one with people in suits or dresses, dances and classical music (plus Pinkie music), life sized character statues, dances, food, VIPs and much more, all in one (or more than one) night.

topics.body:
A Malaysian female gymnast has won gold in the ASEAN Games.
Sadly, she was criticized by Muslims for wearing a leotard and exposing her "aurat". Many people bashed her on the TV3 Facebook page and one even told her to just strip if she’s wearing something so lewd.
There are those that defend her as well and criticize them for focusing on her clothing instead of the fact that she won gold.

I’m glad that there are those that defended her but still, it’s a bit sad that there still exists people with traditional beliefs and views.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
